title: Complementary & Alternative Medicine
cleaned_text: Complementary & Alternative Medicine If you've made the decision to seek natural / complementary / alternative therapies for your child's care, involve your pediatrician in the process. In most cases, such therapies work best when used in combination with traditional medical care.
